Articles.Content:
Each vessel should have a User Stickie in the same style as the yellow stickies in the IVA.

The stickie should should be available by either right clicking on the command pod or as a separate 'stickie' button.

The stickie can be used for Remembering Action keys and of course things like Burn time which the game seems to forget.

Until this stickie is available for users I suggest users do as I do and rename the ship ie. "Applecore" becomes "Applecore BURN 2m28s" (or whatever the burn time may be).

Unfortunately there is insufficient space for a list of my action keys in the name field of the ship. (and if there was it would look awful in map view.)
YES! But in not-IVA as well. Maybe on the other side of the altimeter from the Abort button?
